projects.title: Multimodal AI Webtoon Generator
projects.bodyText:
I've been working on creating an infinite-scroll real-time multimodal webtoon generator. It generates text, images and sound as you scroll along~ 
 Enjoy a meme while we wait...

projects.title: Autonomous Hydroponics Greenhouse System
projects.bodyText: From Aug - Dec 2023, my team and I worked on a Raspberry Pi hardware, ROS2 interface and autonomous agent software to monitor and grow ~50 lettuce and radishes. We ate them.

projects.title: Litter Detection Heatmap
projects.bodyText: Winner of the Bloomberg Sustainability Prize, HackCMU 2021. My team fine-tuned Detectron2's region-based convolutional neural network model for litter (86% acc) and analyzed bus camera footage to visualize Pittsburgh's litter density on a heatmap (Google Maps)

projects.title: Homebound
projects.bodyText: Navigate this 3D Intergalactic Space Shooter to find your way home! Battle hundreds of enemy spacecraft in a beautifully-rendered universe.

projects.title: Sign Language to Speech translator
projects.bodyText: Winner of the Prize for Social Good, Hack112 2021. My team and I trained a deep learning model for webcam translation of American Sign Language.

projects.title: Project Sushi
projects.bodyText: You control a tiny human with a large craving for sushi! Help him navigate various perils including the conveyor belt, onerous onigiri, monstrous maki, and even chopsticks from above whose owners think that he's a food item as well!
